verses.verse: Moreover the word <WH1697> of Jehovah <WH3068> came unto me <WH559>, saying,
Son <WH1121> of man <WH120>, set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> against mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and prophesy against it <WH5012>,

and say <WH559> unto it <WH559>, Thus saith the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>: Behold <WH2022>, I am against thee, O mount Seir <WH8165>, and I will stretch out <WH5186> my hand <WH3027> against thee <WH5414>, and I will make thee a desolation <WH8077> and an astonishment <WH8077>.
I will lay <WH7760> thy cities <WH5892> waste <WH2723>, and thou shalt be desolate <WH8077>; and thou shalt know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.

Because thou hast had a perpetual <WH5769> enmity <WH342>, and hast given <WH5064> over the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> to the power <WH3027> of the sword <WH2719> in the time <WH6256> of their calamity <WH343>, in the time <WH6256> of the iniquity <WH5771> of the end <WH7093>;

therefore <WH2416>, as I live, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>, I will prepare <WH6213> thee unto blood <WH1818>, and blood <WH1818> shall pursue <WH7291> thee <WH518>: since thou hast not hated <WH8130> blood <WH1818>, therefore blood <WH1818> shall pursue thee <WH7291>.

Thus will I make <WH5414> mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165> an <WH8077> astonishment <WH8077> and a desolation <WH8077>; and I will cut off <WH3772> from it him that passeth through and him that returneth <WH7725>.

And I will fill <WH4390> its mountains <WH2022> with its slain <WH2491>: in thy hills <WH1389> and in thy valleys <WH1516> and in all thy watercourses <WH650> shall they fall <WH5307> that are slain <WH2491> with the sword <WH2719>.
I will make <WH5414> thee a perpetual <WH5769> desolation <WH8077>, and thy cities <WH5892> shall not be inhabited <WH7725>; and ye shall know <WH3045> that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
Because thou hast said <WH559>, These two <WH8147> nations <WH1471> and these two <WH8147> countries <WH776> shall be mine <WH3423>, and we will possess it <WH3068>; whereas Jehovah was there:

therefore <WH2416>, as I live, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH136>, I will do <WH6213> according to thine anger <WH639>, and according to thine envy <WH7068> which thou hast showed <WH6213> out of thy hatred <WH8135> against them <WH3045>; and I will make myself known among them <WH8199>, when I shall judge thee.

And thou shalt know <WH3045> that I <WH3068>, Jehovah, have heard <WH8085> all thy revilings <WH5007> which thou hast spoken <WH559> against the mountains <WH2022> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, They are laid desolate <WH8074>, they are given <WH5414> us to devour <WH402>.
And ye have magnified <WH1431> yourselves against me with your mouth <WH6310>, and have multiplied <WH6280> your words <WH1697> against me <WH8085>: I have heard it.
Thus saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>: When the whole earth <WH776> rejoiceth <WH8055>, I will make <WH6213> thee desolate <WH8077>.

As thou didst rejoice <WH8057> over the inheritance <WH5159> of the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, because it was desolate <WH8074>, so will I do <WH6213> unto thee <WH8077>: thou shalt be desolate, O mount <WH2022> Seir <WH8165>, and all Edom <WH123>, even all of it <WH3045>; and they shall know that I am Jehovah <WH3068>.
